body_content.explanation: a container full of bran (= the outer covering of grain), used in a lucky dip (= a game in which you pay to pick a prize out of a container with many different prizes in it, without being able to see what you are taking):
examples: Attractions include a bouncy slide for youngsters, a bran tub, face painting and pony rides.

body_content.explanation: a situation that includes a mixture of different things, so you are not sure what you are going to get or experience:
examples: It is a wonderfully unpredictable bran tub of a show.
